name: BattleoftheBooksThirdGrade-CPE
0:
”Alexa, open Bob Third Grade”
”Alexa, start Bob Third Grade”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bob third grade
des:
Alexa can help you study for your Battle of the Books at Cottonwood Point Elementary. You can review the flash cards and then test your knowledge. At any point you can say "Alexa, review mode" to switch to review or say "Alexa, test mode" to start a test. You can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next card. At any point during the test, you can say "Alexa, what's my score" to get your current test score.
This skill was created by a parent and it is not affiliated with the Blue Valley School District.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
